solution_line_template: Across Tuesday and Wednesday, Wilfred eats {carrots_tuesday} + {carrots_wednesday} = <<{carrots_tuesday}+{carrots_wednesday}={carrots_tuesday_wednesday}>>{carrots_tuesday_wednesday} carrots
On Thursday, Wilfred needs to eat {total_carrots_target} - {carrots_tuesday_wednesday} = <<{total_carrots_target}-{carrots_tuesday_wednesday}={carrots_thursday}>>{carrots_thursday} carrots
